enrollOptions.description: PublicKeyCredentialCreationOptions suitable for JSON transmission to navigator.credentials.create()

enrollInfo.description: Registration response JSON from navigator.credentials.create(), with all ArrayBuffers Base64URL-encoded

response.description: Authenticator attestation response, with all binary fields Base64URL-encoded

rk.description: Whether the credential is resident-key capable

passkeyOption.description: A variant of PublicKeyCredentialRequestOptions suitable for JSON transmission to the browser to be passed into navigator.credentials.get().

timeout.description: Milliseconds the caller is willing to wait for the call to complete

allowCredentials.description: List of credential descriptors that are allowed for assertion

hints.description: Hints to guide the browserâ€™s authenticator UX

passkeyInfo.description: Authentication response JSON from navigator.credentials.get(), with all ArrayBuffers Base64URL-encoded

response.description: Authenticator assertion response, with all binary fields Base64URL-encoded

rk.description: Whether the credential is resident-key capable
